product_name: Camp Chef Barbecue Grill Box with Lid - Single Burner
long_description: The Camp Chef Barbecue Grill Box with Lid converts your Camp Chef 2-burner or 3-burner stove into a powerful grill, letting you enjoy vegetables, steaks, hamburgers and hot dogs. Simply place the Barbecue Grill Box on the grate of your Camp Chef stove (sold separately), light the stove and proceed with your grilling. Covers 1 burner on your 2- or 3-burner Camp Chef stove, leaving the other burners available for pots and pans. Built-in heat diffuser plate ensures even cooking. Removable cast iron grate provides high-quality grilling. Includes a removable lid. Compatible with the Camp Chef Yukon, Explorer, Outdoorsman 2-burner stoves; also compatible with Big Gas Grill, Pro 90, Tahoe, Expedition 3X 3-burner stoves.
short_description: The Camp Chef Barbecue Grill Box with Lid converts your Camp Chef 2-burner or 3-burner stove into a powerful grill, letting you enjoy vegetables, steaks, hamburgers and hot dogs.
